topic.title: The Circumstances of the Text Edition of the Underlying Volume (//fileDesc/sourceDesc/biblFull/publicationStmt)

body.p: Details of the circumstances of the text edition, which served as a original for the DTA full text, are reproduced in the Publication Statement (<publicationStmt>) within the <biblFull> element of the Source Description.

The publisher or print shop responsible for the underlying text edition is specified in the <publisher> element of <publicationStmt>. The <publisher> element or <publisher> elements always come first in the <publicationStmt> element, i. e. before the information on the source's place and date of publication. If more than one entry is required for the publisher or print shop, each entry is placed in a separate <publisher> element.

The place of publication is specified in the <pubPlace> element of <publicationStmt>. In the case of multiple places of publication, each place of publication is also located in a separate <pubPlace> element.
The dating is located in a sub-element <date>. The type of dating is specified via a @type attribute. The following values can be used for @type:

row.entry: year of publication of this source (mandatory)
year of publication of the first edition, if different from the year of publication of the source
year of origin, if different from the year of publication of the source and the year of publication of the first edition

body.codeblock: <publicationStmt> <publisher> <!-- in the first place; if necessary, to be used several times --> <name>[publisher/print shop]</name> </publisher> <pubPlace>[place of publication]</pubPlace> <!-- if necessary, to be used several times --> <date type="publication">[year of publication]</date> <date type="firstPublication">[year of publication of the first edition]</date> <!-- where applicable --> <date type="creation">[year of origin of the text]</date> <!-- where applicable --> </publicationStmt>
